Marfa Petrovna left her three thousand roubles. This is definitely true. She set it up a week before she died, and I saw it happen. Avdotya Romanovna will get the money in two or three weeks. 

“Are you sure?” 

“Yes, tell her. Well, goodbye. I’m staying very close to you.” 

As he left, Svidrigaïlov bumped into Razumihin in the doorway.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Svidrigaïlov reveals that Marfa Petrovna left three thousand roubles to Dounia before her death.
